page.title: 04My neighbour's day.
page.content: My neighbour is a housewife with a husband and two children. She wakes at 6 a.m. and gets up quickly. For breakfast she has cereals,toast and tea. Her children eat with her. Her morning is spent taking children to school, shopping and visiting grandparents. Sometimes she meets other mums for coffee and then she has lunch at home,usually a salad, fruit and tea.In the afternoon she does household chores,gardening and collects children from school.Her evening meal is meat or fish and vegetables,with fruit salad or pie and tea.She reads,and watches television for short periods or does other hobbies, ending the day with a drink and going to bed between 10.30. and 11.00 p.m.
